conbody.p: The content of the Install Base table depends on the user who is logged in. See the section User Roles for more information about users. Install base table

ul.li: Customer: Displays the name of the customer.
Channel: The Channel is the sales channel with responsibility for the customer.
Region: The Region indicates where the customer's systems are installed.
Systems: The Systems column displays the number of systems that a customer has deployed.
Telemetry: The Telemetry columns displays if the customer's systems are able to upload the telemetry data or not.
